We believed the Goddess would bring us
peace and prayed to her relentlessly,
yet look before us now! The world is filled

name of the Church for deceiving the

それが<ruby><rb>復活</rb><rt>ふっかつ</rt></ruby>した<ruby><rb>影響</rb><rt>えいきょう</rt></ruby>により、

devastation. But despite how fervently she
attempted to drive that point home...

如此竭力呼吁人们保持冷静……

正竭盡所能地戰鬥著。

context.en_us: We will protect this world no matter what,\nso do not lose sight of yourselves!
context.ja_jp: この<ruby><rb>世界</rb><rt>せかい</rt></ruby>は<ruby><rb>私</rb><rt>わたし</rt></ruby>たちが<ruby><rb>必</rb><rt>かなら</rt></ruby>ず<ruby><rb>守</rb><rt>まも</rt></ruby>ります。\nだからみなさんは、どうか<ruby><rb>自分</rb><rt>じぶん</rt></ruby>を\n<ruby><rb>見失</rb><rt>みうしな</rt></ruby>わないでください。

context.en_us: And what basis does she have for these\nwild claims, eh?! How can any of you fools\nbelieve a single word the Auspex says?!

context.en_us: Would you name me a liar, then?

context.en_us:

How many of your actions were driven
by that demon, and how many were the
true workings of your secret soul?!
context.ja_jp: だが、その<ruby><rb>行</rb><rt>おこな</rt></ruby>いのどこまでが<ruby><rb>魔神</rb><rt>まじん</rt></ruby>の\n<ruby><rb>意思</rb><rt>いし</rt></ruby>なのかはわからない……<ruby><rb>否</rb><rt>いな</rt></ruby>！\nあれこそが<ruby><rb>貴様</rb><rt>きさま</rt></ruby>の<ruby><rb>本性</rb><rt>ほんしょう</rt></ruby>ではないか!?

Show us proof, Auspex! Show us that you
are the pure guiding light you claim to be!
Show us proof that you can actually save
the world from its impending doom!
